yammertime.title: Yammertime web-app
yammertime.writeup: Yammertime is a web-app which aggregates Yammer posts in a Windows 8 Metro UI type of tiled grid. It is perfect for display on large screens and was used on a touchsreen TV located in the kitchen at Habanero Consulting where I developed this web-app during my internship. People used it to catch up on Yammer chatter during lunchtime. See the Github repo
